dcterms:creator: Vlad Niculae
Joonsuk Park
Claire Cardie
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of user-generated comments from an online platform, used for argumentative link prediction and proposition classification tasks. It contains 731 user comments with approximately 4,700 propositions, annotated for argumentative structure.
dcterms:title: Cornell eRule-making Corpus (CDCP)
